title: Kourtney Kardashian stuns in black corset and knee high boots
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

One of reality TV's biggest queens, Kourtney Kardashian , has fans swooning with her latest album of sexy snaps.

Kourtney posed on a street corner in a racy black corset and knee high red leather boots, smouldering behind a pair of shades.

She was joined by a hunky looking, tattooed man who fans are also gushing over.

They've been quick to pour praise on the eldest of the Kardashian brood, with one telling Kourt: "I love you and you don't even know it."

Another screamed: "I LOVE YOU MORE THAN YOU CAN IMAGINE."

A third wished her well: "HI QUEEN I HOPE YOU HAVE THE BEST DAY EVER."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

This isn't the first time the 40 year old has sent fans into meltdown.

Earlier this month, the mum of three shared a throwback snap with her 82.3 million followers of herself dressed as pop goddess Ariana Grande - complete with iconic high ponytail.

She's been keeping herself busy with her new business Poosh - an online lifestyle and e-commerce destination.

She ran the launch event with just the support of mum Kris, as none of her four sisters could make it to the party.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Kourtney felt it was good for her to go solo with her business, saying it was important for her confidence and the authenticity of the brand.

Kourt dished to People magazine : "I think doing such a successful event [with just my mum] made me stronger. It made me think, you know, that I could do it on my own.

"What feels authentic to me for a launch feels different to Kim, feels different to Kylie. So it's nice to just have our own approaches.

"I feel like it was a big thing for me to only take on something my heart and soul was really in."
description: Kourtney struck a sultry pose on a street corner while rocking a revealing black corset and leather boots
